main.name: Saneel Daniel
main.description: I am a motivated self-learner, currently in my final year of Undergraduation In Software Engineering and seeking full-time/intern Full-Stack Software/BlockChain Developer Roles. I hope to leverage my knowledge and experience to be able to work on  complex and challenging projects
main.bio: Curiosity & Eagerness about technologies and understanding how their implementation can help serve the community, is what draws me towards the fields of Software Development. I have a good understanding of Data Structures and Algorithms, and core concepts of Computer Science. Proficient in Web/Mobile Development with ReactJS, and React Native, and also hold strong knowledge and experience in back-end development with Java, Node.JS, and AWS/GCP Cloud Tools.
main.contactmessage: I hope you found my profile worthwhile and to get in touch with you !

resume.skillmessage: Proficient in Back-End development with Node.JS, Java, Solidity, and Express.JS, and Front-End development with ReactJS, React Native, Web3.Js!
resume.additionalSkills: I am a professional and self-motivated individual, Always eager to learn new things, and excited to build things that matter.

education.degree: Bachelors of Science in Software Engineering
education.description: As part of my Academic Curriculum, I assimilated knowledge and interest in various technologies for Software Developement. Being part of the SJSU community, also helped me understand the value of team work and collaborative efforts.

education.school: Institute Of Diploma Studies, Nirma University
education.description: As part of my Diploma, I was academically briefed on various parts and functions of the Information Technology Stack. Out of all the valuable learning material, the power of Coding and Software Developement stuck with me.

work.title: Volunteer, Blockchain Developer
work.description: Collaborating remotely with a team of 15 towards research, design and implementation of Cobalt Lend (CBLT) community voting based lending system business logic and coin swap function as smart contracts on the Ethereum Blockchain, and/or NULS framework. System implementation tech stack EVM, Solidity, Java, React.JS, NULS Chain Box.

work.title: Full-Stack Web Developer
work.description: Collaborating with another team-mate to design and develop a production grade (Sass) single-vendor e-commerce web app for a client. Major features like subscriptions, build-your-own console that allows users to assemble a desktop from scratch as per their needs, etc. Tech Stack: SQL Server, Node.js, GraphQL, Bootstrap 4, React/Next.Js

work.company: Event Services, San Jose State University
work.title: AV Technician
work.description: Coordinating with clients and managing the technical (AV) requirements for everyday events held in the Student Union at SJSU were a big part of my responsibilities.

work.title: Software Developer Intern
work.description:
Assisted the IT team of Nirma University, as part of a small team of student developers, in designing, prototyping and developing a scalable web portal for students to stay updated of all the news/updates about the Campus Community. 
 Technology Stack: Asp.Net, JavaScript,HTML & Microsoft SQL Server

work.title: Co-Founder / Partner
work.description: Co-Founded an Event Organizing & Managing Firm along with 3 other partners.  Organized a total of 4 events in the year 2014-2015, generating a revenue of over $8000

projects.title: NBA player Analysis/Web-Scrapping

testimonials.text: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
Tell me and I forget, teach me and I may remember, involve me and I learn.
It’s not that I’m so smart, it’s just that I stay with problems longer.
